text: Joseph Terrence "Joey" Taylor (born 18 August 1997) is a Montserratian footballer who plays for Sevenoaks Town of the Isthmian League and the Montserrat national team. ==Career== In June 2019, Taylor joined Staines Town.Second summer departure from Horsham as Staines Town switch is confirmed, wscountytimes.co.uk, 20 June 2019 On 1 January 2020, he joined Sevenoaks Town.A Pair Of Mighty Oaks! == International career == On 8 September 2018, Taylor made his international debut and scored his first international goal for Montserrat in a 1–2 loss against El Salvador in a CONCACAF Nations League qualification match. === International goals === :Scores and results list Montserrat's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" |- ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! Competition |- |1. || 8 September 2018 || Blakes Estate Stadium, Lookout, Montserrat || ||align=center| 1–0 || 1–2 || 2019–20 CONCACAF Nations League qualification |- |} == Personal life == Taylor's brother, Lyle, also plays for Montserrat. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:English footballers Category:English people of Montserratian descent Category:Black English sportspeople Category:English Football League players Category:Welling United F.C. players Category:Leatherhead F.C. players Category:East Grinstead Town F.C. players Category:VCD Athletic F.C. players Category:Burgess Hill Town F.C. players Category:Horsham F.C. players Category:Hythe Town F.C. players Category:Staines Town F.C. players Category:Sevenoaks Town F.C. players Category:Isthmian League players Category:Montserratian footballers Category:Montserrat international footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders
title: Joey Taylor (footballer)
